record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL TUESDAY, MAY 6, 2008, AT 10 A.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL TUESDAY, MAY 6, 2008, AT 10 A.M. -- (Senate - May 02, 2008)

[Page: S3750]

speaking.paragraph: I now ask unanimous consent the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:30 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, May 6, 2008, at 10 a.m.
